amendment.description: To limit the reduction in operations within the Civil Engineering Program of the Coast Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4613 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4613 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7488; text: CR S7488) To limit the reduction in operations within the Civil Engineering Program of the Coast Guard.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4613 proposed by Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4613 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
